item.title: Foundations of CHI 1
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: in which we lay the groundwork for what this course will explore, its larger contexts, and what the major research questions are. Goals for this week this that the other thing Read 1.1 Cultural Heritage and its Institutions Abt, Jeffrey. 2008. ‘The Origins of the Public Museum’ in Sharon Macdonald, ed. ‘Companion to Museum Studies’. Available online from Macodrum Library. Bennett, Tony. 1990.
